job.title: Full-Stack Software Development Engineer - Maxis Team
job.description: ltstronggtltugtabout gmltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggttheres never been a more exciting time to work for general motorsltbrgtltbrgtto achieve our vision of a world with zero crashes zero emissions and zero congestion we need people to join us who are passionate about creating safer better and more sustainable ways for people to get around this bold vision wont happen overnight but just as we transformed how the world moved in the last century we are committed to transforming how we move today and in the futureltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwhy work for usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtour culture is focused on building inclusive teams where differences and unique perspectives are embraced so you can contribute to your fullest potential as you pursue your career our locations feature a variety of work environments including open work spaces and virtual connection platforms to inspire productivity and flexible collaboration and we are proud to support our employees volunteer interests and make it a priority to join together in efforts that give back to our communitiesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtjob descriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtare youltstronggt ltstronggtlooking to be a part of a hardworking passionate team that values innovation creativity and speedltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtthere has never been a better time to work for general motors ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtin recent years gm information technology has successfully executed the largest it transformation in the history of the automotive industry fully insourcing what once was a nearly completely outsourced it function today gm it is a dynamic and fast paced organization that designs develops and maintains all it infrastructure applications and solutions enabling gms global operations from designing and building the next generation of electric and other vehicles to developing a worldclass gm experience for our dealers and customers gm it is driving real change in the most iconic automaker on the planet our team delivers unique enterprisewide it solutions in cuttingedge technologies such as mobility telematics missioncritical business systems supercomputing cloud vehicle engineering and realtime computing we offer challenging positions for passionate professionals looking to advance their careers and be a part of an it organization focused on innovation speed and business valueltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltstronggtltugtabout the roleltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtmaxis software engineers are responsible for new and innovative software development and design sophisticated and professional code for general motors in the big data and analytics ecosystem we work closely with it verticals and business partners to deliver cutting edge capabilities to delight our customers and build a datadriven cultureltbrgtltbrgtthe fullstack software engineer will have a phenomenal team to work alongside each member has an outstanding background and experience level from product managers ui designers fullstack software engineers and platform engineers our engineers work in highly collaborative and agile environments across multiple maxis products for internal and external customers ie dealers and suppliers maxis software engineers have a variety of enterprise and open source technology available to incorporate into their solutions our engineers are asked toltbrgtltulgtltligtquickly design develop and deliver new codeltligtltligtperform root cause analysis do technology evaluations and develop quick prototypesltligtltligtmodern development patterns and platforms microservices web services rest containers cloud nativeltligtltligtconsistently follow the specified software development methodologyltligtltligtpromote improvements in programming practices such as acceptance test driven development continuous integration and continuous deliveryltligtltligtparticipate in corporate hackathons voluntary to help bring new perspectives to existing opportunitiesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtminimum qualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtadditional job descriptionltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtexperience with agile teams that regularly delivered software while developing reusable code practicing code reviews and performing unit testsltligtltligtover years of demonstrated software development experience in one or more of the java python javascript typescript for restful servicesltligtltligtover years of demonstrated software development experience in one or more html scssless angular vuejs flutter react and javascriptltligtltligtexpertise in sql relational databases keyvalue datastores and document stores cassandra redis postgresql ms sql serverltligtltligtcrafting selfcontained reusable and testable modules and components in frontend and backend work docker kubernetes pivotal cloud foundary openshiftltligtltligtcreative problemsolving skills that deliver elegant solutions to complex issuesltligtltligtbachelor degree in computer science or related field or equivalent combination of education and recent relevant work experienceltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtpreferred qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtover years developing factor apps including designing and implementing continuous integration build and deliveryltligtltligtover years utilizing platform and infrastructure as a service technologies and capabilities and their corresponding services object store configuration management service registries etcltligtltligtover years of recent angular version development experienceltligtltligtmobile application developmentpublishingltligtltligtexperience using git source control doing rebases merges and handling merge conflictsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtbenefits overviewltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtthe goal of the general motors total rewards program is to support the health and wellbeing of you and your family our comprehensive compensation plan incudes the following benefits in addition to many othersltbrgtltulgtltligt paid time off including vacation days holidays and parental leave for mothers fathers and adoptive parentsltligtltligt healthcare including a triple tax advantaged health savings account and wellness incentive dental vision and life insurance plans to cover you and your familyltligtltligt company and matching contributions to k savings plan to help you save for retirementltligtltligt global recognition program for peers and leaders to recognize and be recognized for results and behaviors that reflect our company valuesltligtltligt tuition assistance and student loan refinancingltligtltligt discount on gm vehicles for you your family and friendsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtdiversity informationltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtgeneral motors is committed to being a workplace that is not only free of discrimination but one that genuinely fosters inclusion and belonging we strongly believe that workforce diversity creates an environment in which our employees can thrive and develop better products for our customers we understand and embrace the variety through which people gain experiences whether through professional personal educational or volunteer opportunitiesgm is proud to be an equal opportunity employerltbrgtltbrgtwe encourage interested candidates to review the key responsibilities and qualifications and apply for any positions that match your skills and capabilitiesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtequal employment opportunity statementsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtthe policy of general motors is to extend opportunities to qualified applicants and employees on an equal basis regardless of an individuals age race color sex religion national origin disability sexual orientation gender identityexpression or veteran status additionally general motors is committed to being an equal employment opportunity eeo employer and offers opportunities to all job seekers including individuals with disabilities if you need a reasonable accommodation to assist with your job search or application for employment email us atcareersaccommodationsgmcom in your email please include a description of the specific accommodation you are requesting as well as the job title and requisition number of the position for which you are applying
